enWisdom: Intelligence is an adornment and foolishness is a disgrace
The intellect is an adornment for the one who is endowed with it
The adornment of religion is intelligence
The adornment of religion is intelligence

Wisdom: الْعَقْلُ أَجْمَلُ زِينَةٍ وَالْعِلْمُ أَشْرَفُ مَزِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: The intellect is the most beautiful adornment and knowledge is the most honourable merit
The intellect is the best ornament
Intellect is the most honourable merit

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا الشَّرَفُ بِالْعَقْلِ وَالْأَدَبِ لَا بِالْمَالِ وَالْحَسَبِ
enWisdom: Indeed honour is only attained by intellect and etiquette, not because of wealth and lineage
